description:
Clean, modern entire 1 bedroom apartment near Bedford Park.

CLEAN modern 1 bedroom apartment. 

Access to all rooms in apartment. I will not be here for your stay. I will greet you when u arrive, and then it's all yours !

Feel free to reach out to me at anytime during your stay if you need assistance.

Close to everything! All supermarkets and shopping areas. Bedford park reservoir for walking and running . 25 minutes to manhattan on the D express train

4 train and D train to manhattan. Express busses to manhattan
